勾选此项后将使用字符串变量决定语音地址: If checked, it will use a string variable to determine the voice address
设置场景对象的该模块的属性: Set the attributes of this module of the scene object
通常情况下用于修改已拥有的模块中的基元属性: It is usually used to modify the primitive attributes in the owned module
需要完成常规的战斗流程: Need to complete the regular fighting process
根据战斗实际胜负: According to the actual outcome of the battle
勾选此项表示无视命中率和免疫状态: Check this item to ignore hit rate and immune status
生成的敌人所在队伍内的编号: The generated number of the enemy team
使用技能替换普通攻击: Use skills to replace normal attacks
需要选择技能时: When skills need to be selected
勾选此项后如果是玩家角色则从背包中穿戴: After checking this item, if it is a player character, wear it from the package
否则生成一件装备进行穿戴: Otherwise, generate a piece of equipment to wear
从玩家背包中穿戴: Wear it from the player's package
操作不为佩戴时: When the operation is not wearing
佩戴时或未使用部位时: When wearing or when not in use
未能够实际卸下装备时则值为: If the equipment cannot be actually unloaded, the value is
通过所在队伍位置查找玩家拥有的角色: By the player in team position
当游戏启动的时候即调用该事件: This event is called when the game starts
开始界面快捷键和右键支持: Start interface shortcut key and right-click support
以下的事件处理无需加入至存档: The following event handling does not need to be added to the file
而是每次进入游戏都会初始化执行一次: It will be initialized and executed every time you enter the game
菜单已打开的场合则关闭菜单: When the menu is open, close the menu
触发当前坐标点的空对象的点击事件: Trigger the clicking event of the empty object of the current coordinate point
开启时自动执行该事件: Automatically execute this event when it is turned on
指令后会自动执行该事件: This event is automatically executed after the command
加载完后自动执行该事件: Automatically execute this event after loading
完成后自动执行该事件: Automatically execute this event after completion
失败时自动执行该事件: Automatically execute this event on failure
成功时自动执行该事件: Automatically execute this event on success
切换场景暂时关闭虚拟键盘: Switch scene and temporarily close the virtual keyboard
当执行场景对象的点击事件前执行的事件: The event executed before the click event of the scene object is executed
当执行场景对象的碰触事件前执行的事件: The event executed before the touch event of the scene object is executed
当执行场景对象的离开碰触事件前执行的事件: The event executed before the leaving touch event of the execution scene object
当执行场景对象的出现事件前执行的事件: The event executed before the occurrence of the event of the execution scene object
当执行场景对象的行为开始前执行的事件: The event executed before the execution of the scene object
如果是玩家对象: If it is a player object
则派发新的行为前暂停奔跑: Then stop running before distributing new behaviors
当执行场景对象的行为结束后执行的事件: The event executed when the behavior of the execution scene object ends
触发战斗时执行的事件: Event to be executed when triggering a battle
是否需要准备阶段: Whether the preparation stage is required
满足胜负条件后执行的事件: Events executed after meeting the winning/losing conditions
战斗奖励获得时执行的事件: Event executed when battle reward is obtained
新的回合开始时执行的事件: Event executed at the beginning of a new round
开始播放行动时执行的事件: Event executed when the action starts playing
回合结束时开始结算状态等效果时执行的事件: Event to be executed at the end of a round when the settlement status and other effects are started
每个战斗者出现时执行的事件: Events to be executed when each combatant appears
战斗者死亡后离场: Depart after the death of the fighter
目前指需要离场的敌人: At present, it refers to the enemy who needs to leave
背包的目标窗口显示中时: When the target window of the package is displayed
标题界面关闭相关界面: The title interface closes the related interface
不允许强制发出指令时: When mandatory command is not allowed
当未拥有时也能够使用: Can also be used when not owned
转化到范围内坐标: Transform to Coordinates Within the Range
像素根据时间和速度进行偏移: Pixel Offset Based on Time and Velocity
限制从内容区域内获取像素而非空白的边缘: Restricting the Retrieval of Pixels (Not Blank) from Within the Content Area
从拼合图中获取的该图像的坐标空间: Coordinate Space of the Image Obtained from the Sprite Sheet
是否来自显示对象: Is it from the display object
否则来自移动对象: Is it from a moving object
记录上一个关联的指令的参数: Record the parameters of the previous associated instruction
除了来自敌人角色的掉落设定外: In addition to drop settings from enemy actors
可在此处追加该队伍额外的掉落物品: additional dropped items for this team can be added here
这些参数修改后需要刷新实际图片显示: After modifying these parameters, the actual image display needs to be refreshed
获取上一个关联指令的参数: Get the parameters of the previous associated command
非播放模式下不播放: Do not play in non playback mode
根据世界设定的碰撞组关系决定是否互相碰撞: Determine whether to collide with each other based on the collision group relationship set by the world setting
部分系统预设的属性可能修改后无效或报错: Some preset properties may become invalid after modification
因为其与其他数据有强关联或其他原因: Due to its strong correlation with other data
